data.title: London Biggin Hill Airport on LinkedIn: #londonbigginhill #businessaviation #thelanding #hospitalitynews
data.meta_description:
Today we are announcing the appointment of @Steven Thorne-Farrar as general manager of the airport’s new on-site, 4-star boutique hotel, The Landing. 

Steven… | 16 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Happy International Cat Day from all of us at London Biggin Hill Airport 🐾 With our SkyPets service, travelling with your feline friend has never been easier. Our dedicated facilities and caring staff ensure a comfortable and stress-free experience for both you and your pet. Join us today to celebrate our incredible SkyPets team, who go above and beyond to make pet travel ‘paw-sible’ for all our customers. Discover more ➡️ https://lnkd.in/eWqqfkGa #SkyPets #InternationalCatDay #TravelWithPets #BizAv #LondonBigginHill

Congratulations to Bombardier for being voted #1, among all business jet manufacturers, in Aviation International News' 2024 Product Support Survey. The accolade is a real testament to the team’s dedication to providing a world-class support and services experience, ensuring customers are at the centre of everything they do. We are proud to have Bombardier as part of our ecosystem of aerospace businesses here at London Biggin Hill Airport, providing industry-leading services to our global customer base. #BizAv #LondonBigginHill #Bombardier

“𝗕𝗥𝗢𝗠𝗟𝗘𝗬 𝟮𝟰-𝟮𝟱 𝗖𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗥𝗘𝗗 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗞𝗜𝗖𝗞-𝗢𝗙𝗙!” ⚽️ Today, we’re delighted to announce our support as title sponsor of Bromley Football Club’s Women’s Team for the 2024-25 season. The collaboration is the next step in our ongoing commitment to promote gender diversity and champion increasing female accessibility, to both football and aviation, within the London Borough of Bromley. David Winstanley MA FRAeS, Chief Executive Officer at London Biggin Hill Airport, said: “We have a well-established and purposeful relationship with Bromley Football Club. Having initially partnered to support the Bromley FC Community Trust Women & Girls’ Provision in 2023, we are excited to build on our association to help the growth of the women’s game in Bromley.” Read the full news release ➡️ https://lnkd.in/gG-MWgiH #WeAreBromley #LondonBigginHill #Bromley #BromleyFC #PlayingOurPart

In South East London Chamber of Commerce’s latest issue of The Masthead, our CEO, David Winstanley MA FRAeS shares how business aviation airports play a crucial role in the future by supporting innovation, skills development and job creation. Here at London Biggin Hill Airport, we have forged strong connections with the public and private sectors, working closely with all parties to generate skilled jobs and drive responsible economic growth, while supporting our local community and honouring the airport’s historic status. Read the article on pages 16 & 17 in The Masthead ➡️ https://lnkd.in/euf-A-_U #BizAv #BusinessAviation #LondonBigginHill #Jobs #EconomicGrowth #Innovation #Skills

Congratulations to BIGGIN HILL HERITAGE HANGAR LTD who have just returned their sixteenth Spitfire to the air! MK912 took its maiden post-restoration flight from London Biggin Hill earlier this week; almost nine years to the day since its last flight on 1st August 2015. The aircraft proudly carries the markings of 312 Squadron (Czech) which it wore on D-Day, flown by P/O Miroslav ‘Tony’ Liskutin DFC. He was believed to be the first allied fighter pilot to land in France on 6th June 1944. Biggin Hill Heritage Hangar is home to the largest gathering of Spitfires in the world and is at the forefront of heritage restoration. You can also fly in one of their two-seat Spitfires from the most famous RAF fighter station of World War Two. Discover more ➡️ https://lnkd.in/eWd-ae_m #Heritage #Spitfires #BigginHill Flyaspitfire.com

𝗜𝘁'𝘀 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗕𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 Our Commercial Director, Robert Walters FRAeS, was honoured to attend the BBGA British Business and General Aviation Association reception at the House of Commons last night. The prestigious event brought together over 200 industry professionals for an opportunity to meet with Ministers, MPs and other Government officials to demonstrate the value of business aviation in driving economic growth for the UK and Europe. As the providers of the path and gateway to the UK economy, facilitating billions of pounds of inward investment, our industry employs thousands of people, directly and indirectly in the communities where we are located. A new independent economic study, by Lichfields, showcases how far London Biggin Hill Airport has come in the last decade, and its significant role in driving positive economic change, investment and employment. The data highlights that for every 1,000 business air traffic movements, 88 FTE jobs are supported and £6.47 million GVA is generated – injecting tangible benefits into the local and national economies. Discover more here: https://lnkd.in/eVAzYqvN #BizAv #BusinessAviation #Aviation #TimeForBusiness

Congratulations to Bombardier on their record-breaking flight from London Biggin Hill Airport to Montreal, powered by Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF)! Did you know, Air bp’s low carbon renewable fuel, which is produced from waste and residue products, provides a lifecycle carbon reduction of around 80% compared to the traditional jet fuel it replaces. As the first airport in London to offer SAF, this flight marks another significant milestone in our sustainability journey, as we actively work towards our goal of becoming a carbon neutral airport by 2029, whilst also enabling our customers and resident businesses to meet their own sustainability goals. #LondonBigginHill #SustainableAviationFuel #Bombardier #BizAv #SAF #Aviation

This week, we’ve hosted 15 students for our annual work experience week. The initiative aims to inspire local young people by showcasing the diverse career opportunities available here at London Biggin Hill Airport. The students visited several departments to gain hands-on experience in different fields of aviation – including Customer Service, Ground Operations, Rescue & Firefighting and Air Traffic Control. We are passionate about supporting the next generation of aviation professionals by providing them with the tools to unlock their potential. Our work experience opportunity runs during a dedicated week every year, in addition to our two ‘Futures Weeks’ and other initiatives. Discover more: https://lnkd.in/eS3dyJYN #Aviation #AviationCareers #STEM #LondonBigginHill #WorkExperience #Airport #EarlyCareers #NextGen #BizAv #AirportCareers

The Gulfstream G700 has touched down at London Biggin Hill Airport! With a range of over 7,500 NM, the Gulfstream G700 can transport up to 19 passengers non-stop from London Biggin Hill Airport directly to long-haul destinations including Buenos Aires, Los Angeles and Hong Kong. Additionally, its newly developed winglet and Rolls-Royce Pearl 700 engines surpass the aircraft’s predecessor in fuel efficiency, making for a more sustainable and time-saving journey. What a marvellous experience our team had supporting this exceptional aircraft on its delivery flight to its European customer! #LondonBigginHill #GulfstreamG700 #BusinessAviation Gulfstream Aerospace

Today we’re celebrating the installation of over 3,000 PV solar panels on the roof of Bombardier’s service centre, here at London Biggin Hill Airport. This significant investment will provide up to 32% of the service centre’s total energy demand from an on-site renewable source, lowering annual carbon emissions by up to 252 tonnes. Robert Walters, commercial director at London Biggin Hill Airport, says: "Our goal is to achieve carbon neutrality by 2029. With the support of our resident businesses, we’re developing a new airport model that prioritises responsible environmental practices. “We are proud to have Bombardier as part of our ecosystem of aerospace businesses here at London Biggin Hill, working collectively to promote such initiatives within aviation and wider industries." Read more in our latest news release: https://lnkd.in/d_mg7ga5 #LondonBigginHillAirport #Bombardier #SolarPower #RenewableEnergy
